title: NFL Players Approve New CBA: What You Need to Know with Former Agent Joel Corry (Football 3/15)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by former NFL agent Joel Corry to break down the new NFL CBA which was officially approved by the players. The guys break down the key points of the new deal including a 17-game schedule, expanded postseason and much more.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @corryjoel
